Spell Effect: Open the Wall of Ghosts (C.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Open the Wall of Ghosts (Krytyczny Sukces)
Spell Effect: Open the Wall of Ghosts (C.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws.

Spell Effect: Organsight.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Organsight
Spell Effect: Organsight.description:
You see the target as though it's dissected and arrayed before you. For the duration, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Medicine checks against the target that depend on its organs, but a –2 circumstance penalty on Medicine checks depending on seeing its skin.

When you Cast the Spell, attempt a special Recall Knowledge check using Medicine to spot and discern a vital organ. If you have a Lore skill appropriate to the creature, you can use that skill instead of Medicine. If you succeed, the next time you deal piercing or slashing damage to the target with a Strike or spell, you deal 4d6 additional precision damage. Once on each of your subsequent turns, you can use a single action to attempt the special Recall Knowledge check again. The extra damage isn't cumulative, so making the check more than once before a Strike or spell has no extra benefit.

Heightened (+1) The precision damage increases by [[/r 1d6]]{1d6}.

Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Penumbral Disguise
Spell Effect: Penumbral Disguise.description:
You wrap the target in shadows, granting them a +1 status bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} while in dim light or darkness.

In addition, the shadows mask the creature's features. While the creature is in dim light or darkness, other creatures must succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action against the spell's DC to discern details about the target's appearance. For example, without using Seek, other creatures can determine the target's general shape (such as humanoid), but they would need to Seek to determine the target's precise appearance or any other identifying information.

Creatures with darkvision can still see the target and their features normally. The target's normal appearance is revealed in bright light.

Heightened (4th) The status bonus is +2. Creatures with darkvision can no longer discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness without Seeking, though creatures with greater darkvision can still determine these details.

Heightened (6th) As 4th level, except the status bonus is +3 and creatures without darkvision can't determine even general details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness unless they successfully Seek the target; these creatures see a vague shadow instead. Even on a successful Seek, they only determine general features, though they can see details on a critical success.

Heightened (8th) As 6th level, except the status bonus is +4 and even creatures with greater darkvision must Seek to discern details about the target while the target is in dim light or darkness.

Spell Effect: Pest Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Postać Szkodnika
Spell Effect: Pest Form.description:
Przemieniasz się w formę bojową Malutkiego zwierzęcia, takiego jak insekt, jaszczurka, kot czy szczur. Możesz określić dokładny typ stworzenia (na przykład szczur albo modliszka), ale nie ma to wpływu na Rozmiar i statystyki postaci. Będąc w tej postaci zyskujesz cechę zwierzę oraz nie możesz wykonywać Ciosów. Możesz Odwołać to zaklęcie.

Zyskujesz poniższe statystyki i zdolności:

  • KP = 15 + twój poziom. Ignorujesz kary do testów i redukcje Prędkości swojej zbroii.
  • Prędkość 20 stóp.
  • Podatność 5 na obrażenia fizyczne. (Jeśli odniesiesz w tej postaci obrażenia fizyczne, odnosisz 5 dodatkowych punktów obrażeń.)
  • Widzenie w słabym świetle i nieprecyzyjny zmysł węchu na 30 stóp.
  • Modyfikatory Akrobatyki i Skradania Się +10, chyba, że twoje własne są wyższe; Modyfikator Atletyki –4.

Wywyższenie (4.) Możesz zmienić się w latającą istotę, na przykład ptaka, co zapewnia ci Prędkość latania 20 stóp.

Spell Effect: Phase Familiar.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Phase Familiar
Spell Effect: Phase Familiar.description: Your familiar gains resistance to all damage and is immune to precision damage.

Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Phoenix Ward
Spell Effect: Phoenix Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lJdAvY1sJyEmNDc6]{Phoenix Ward}

You raise a fiery shield around yourself, gaining resistance 10 to fire.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Plant Form (Arboreal)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

Taking inspiration from verdant creatures, you transform into a Large plant battle form. You must have space to expand into or the spell is lost. You can substitute a similar specific plant to turn into (such as a pitcher plant instead of a flytrap), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Arboreal
    • Speed 30 feet; you can speak in this form, but you still can't Cast a Spell or supply verbal components.
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Plant Form (Flytrap)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

Taking inspiration from verdant creatures, you transform into a Large plant battle form. You must have space to expand into or the spell is lost. You can substitute a similar specific plant to turn into (such as a pitcher plant instead of a flytrap), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Flytrap
    • Speed 15 feet; resistance 10 to acid;
    • Melee 1 leaf (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8 piercing, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Shambler).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Plant Form (Shambler)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Shambler).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

Taking inspiration from verdant creatures, you transform into a Large plant battle form. You must have space to expand into or the spell is lost. You can substitute a similar specific plant to turn into (such as a pitcher plant instead of a flytrap), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Shambler
    • Speed 20 feet, swim Speed 20 feet; resistance 10 to electricity;
    • Melee 1 vine (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d8 slashing.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Pocket Library.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Kieszonkowa Biblioteka
Spell Effect: Pocket Library.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TjWHgXqPv5jywMti]{Kieszonkową Bibliotekę}

W trakcie trwania tego zaklęcia, kiedy wykonujesz test Pozyskiwania Wiedzy z użyciem wybranej umiejętności możesz wydobyć z międzywymiarowej biblioteki księgę. Jest to częścią akcji Pozyskiwania Wiedzy. Musisz mieć w tym celu wolną rękę. Księga pojawia się w twojej ręce, otwarta na adekwatnej stronie. Zapewnia ci to premię statusową +1 do testu Pozyskania Wiedzy. Jeśli wyrzucisz na tym teście krytyczną porażkę, zamiast tego osiągasz porażkę. Jeśli rzut zakończy się sukcesem a celem Pozyskania Wiedzy była istota, zyskujesz dodatkowe informacje lub szerszy kontekst dotyczący istoty.

Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Practice Makes Perfect
Spell Effect: Practice Makes Perfect.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HOj2YsTpkoMpYJH9]{Practice Makes Perfect}.

The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill.

Spell Effect: Precious Metals.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Precious Metals
Spell Effect: Precious Metals.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.APTMURAW1N0Wpk4w]{Precious Metals}

Your deity blesses base metals to transform them into precious materials.

Spell Effect: Primal Summons.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Primal Summons
Spell Effect: Primal Summons.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons}

You enhance a summoned creature with the power of the elements.

Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Air).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Primal Summons (Air)
Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Air).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons} when you select air.

The creature gains a fly Speed of 60 feet.

Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Earth).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Primal Summons (Earth)
Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Earth).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons} when you select earth.

The creature gains a burrow Speed of 20 feet, and reduces its land Speed by 10 feet (minimum 5 feet).

Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Fire).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Primal Summons (Fire)
Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Fire).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons} when you select fire.

The creature's attacks deal 1d6 extra fire damage.

Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Water).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Primal Summons (Water)
Spell Effect: Primal Summons (Water).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kwlKUxEuT8T15YW6]{Primal Summons} when you select water.

The creature gains a swim Speed of 60 feet.

0.label: Targeted by a Large Ranged Weapon

Spell Effect: Protect Companion.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Ochrona Towarzysza
Spell Effect: Protect Companion.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.AfOpnnwdZwHi2Tnc]{Ochrona Towarzysza}

Cel zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +1 do KP do początku twojej następnej tury.

Spell Effect: Protection.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Protection
Spell Effect: Protection.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gMODOGamz88rgHuf]{Protection}.

The target gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws.

Spell Effect: Protective Ward.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Protective Ward
Spell Effect: Protective Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lY9fOk1qBDDhBT8s]{Protective Wards}

You emanate a shimmering aura of protective magic. You and any allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to AC. Each time you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}, the emanation's radius increases by 5 feet, to a maximum of 30 feet.

Spell Effect: Protector's Sphere.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Protector's Sphere
Spell Effect: Protector's Sphere.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DH9Y3RQGWO0GzXGU]{Protector's Sphere}

You gain resistance to all damage.

Spell Effect: Rallying Anthem.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rallying Anthem
Spell Effect: Rallying Anthem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Rallying Anthem}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, as well as resistance equal to half the spell's rank to physical damage.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic Base Swim Speed)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed. If it already had a swim Speed, it gains a +10-foot status bonus to its swim Speed.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic Speed Bonus)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Aquatic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains a swim Speed equal to its land Speed. If it already had a swim Speed, it gains a +10-foot status bonus to its swim Speed.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Arctic).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rapid Adaptation (Arctic)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Arctic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target isn't affected by severe or extreme cold, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on ice and snow, it gets a critical success instead.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Desert).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rapid Adaptation (Desert)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Desert).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target isn't affected by severe or extreme heat, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on sand, it gets a critical success instead.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Forest).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rapid Adaptation (Forest)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Forest).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Mountain.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rapid Adaptation (Mountain)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Mountain.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} when Climbing, and when it rolls a success on an Acrobatics check to Balance on rubble, it gets a critical success instead.

Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Plains).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rapid Adaptation (Plains)
Spell Effect: Rapid Adaptation (Plains).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.fTK6ysisGhy3hRvz]{Rapid Adaptation}

The target gains a +10-foot status bonus to its land Speed.

Spell Effect: Ray of Frost.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Promień Mrozu
Spell Effect: Ray of Frost.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Promień Mrozu}.

Zimno przeszywa cię do szpiku kości, ponosisz karę statusową –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości.

Spell Effect: Read the Air.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Read the Air
Spell Effect: Read the Air.description: You also gain a +1 status bonus on your next Diplomacy check to Make an Impression on those creatures present when you cast this spell, as long as the check occurs during the duration of the spell. You can read the air only once in a given social situation; casting it again has no effect.

Spell Effect: Regenerate.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Regenerate
Spell Effect: Regenerate.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate}

The target gains regeneration, which restores Hit Points to it at the start of each of its turns.

Spell Effect: Reinforce Eidolon.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Reinforce Eidolon
Spell Effect: Reinforce Eidolon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TYbCj4dgXDOZou9k]{Reinforce Eidolon}

You focus deeply on the link between you and your eidolon and reinforce your eidolon's defenses. Your eidolon gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws, plus resistance to all damage equal to half the spell's rank. Your eidolon can benefit from either Boost Eidolon or Reinforce Eidolon, but not both; if you cast one of these spells during the other's duration, the newer spell replaces the older one.

Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Flames.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Odżywcze Płomienie
Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Flames.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lZx8jZfKrMEtyGY0]{Odżywcze Płomienie}

Allies gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude saves for 1 minute.

Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rejuvenating Touch
Spell Effect: Rejuvenating Touch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xZrTjUub7V09sXZF]{Rejuvenating Touch}.

An ally that recovers Hit Points from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} gains 10 temporary Hit Points at the start of their turn during each of the next 10 rounds. This effect ends if the ally is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}.

Spell Effect: Repel Metal.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Repel Metal
Spell Effect: Repel Metal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.pZBovpzdBNLQQQmE]{Repel Metal}

The target gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Spell Effect: Resilient Touch.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Resilient Touch
Spell Effect: Resilient Touch.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zNN9212H2FGfM7VS]{Lay on Hands} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tCuMXQ0yMrCNwzqW]{Resilient Touch}.

If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC and a +1 status bonus to their saving throws until the end of their next turn.

Spell Effect: Resist Energy.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Resist Energy
Spell Effect: Resist Energy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}

A shield of elemental energy protects a creature against one type of energy damage. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. The target and its gear gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose.

Heightened (4th) The resistance increases to 10.

Heightened (7th) The resistance increases to 15.

Spell Effect: Return the Favor.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Return the Favor
Spell Effect: Return the Favor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9gMQPCaFM27PEIh4]{Return the Favor}.

You gain 12 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The temporary Hit Points increase by 4.

Spell Effect: Righteous Might.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Righteous Might
Spell Effect: Righteous Might.description:
Granted By @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.MMCQsh12TPaDdPbV]{Righteous Might}

You focus all your divine energy and transform yourself into a Medium battle form, similar to your normal form but armed with powerful divine armaments granted by your deity. While in this form, you gain the statistics and abilities listed below. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Speed 40 feet.
  • Resistance 3 against physical damage.
  • Darkvision.
  • A special attack with a righteous armament version of your favored weapon, which is the only attack you can use. Your attack modifier with the special weapon is +21, and your damage bonus is +8 (or +6 for a ranged attack). If your attack modifier with your deity's favored weapon is higher, you can use it instead. You deal three of your weapon's normal damage dice, or three damage dice of one size larger if your weapon is a simple weapon with a d4 or d6 damage die. The weapon has one of the following properties that matches your deity's alignment: anarchic, axiomatic, holy, unholy. If your deity is true neutral, you instead deal an extra 1d6 precision damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach, or 15-foot reach if your deity's favored weapon has reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, resistance 4 against physical damage, attack modifier +28, damage bonus +15 (+12 for a ranged attack), and Athletics +29.

Note: The special attack is not added at this time due to the large amount of player choice and missing deity automation. Additionally, the resistance and removal of armor penalties cannot be automated at present. Please apply these manually for the time being.

Spell Effect: Roar of the Wyrm.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Roar of the Wyrm
Spell Effect: Roar of the Wyrm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FSu6ZKxr3xdS75wq]{Roar of the Wyrm}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy checks for 10 minutes against dragons that were in the area at the time of casting.

0.label: Roar of the Wyrm (dragons in area)

Spell Effect: Rousing Splash.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Rousing Splash
Spell Effect: Rousing Splash.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zhDIiQlJmrd4UDNC]{Rousing Splash}

The target gains temporary Hit Points, which last for 1 minute.

Spell Effect: Runic Body.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Runiczne Ciało
Spell Effect: Runic Body.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EE7Q5BHIrfWNCPtT]{Runiczne Ciało}

Wszystkie ataki wręcz celu stają się atakami ciosów +1, zyskując premię przedmiotu +1 do rzutów na atak i zwiększając ilość kości obrażeń do dwóch.

Wywyższenie (6.) Ataki bez broni stają się atakami większych ciosów +2.

Wywyższenie (9.) Ataki bez broni stają się atakami potężnych ciosów +3.

Spell Effect: Runic Weapon.name: Efelt Zaklęcia: Runiczna Broń
Spell Effect: Runic Weapon.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TFitdEOpQC4SzKQQ]{Runiczną Broń}

Cel staje się bronią ciosów +1, zapewniając mu premię przedmiotu +1 do rzutów na atak oraz zwiększając liczbę kości obrażeń do dwóch.

Wywyższenie (6.) Broń staje się bronią większych ciosów +2.

Wywyższenie (9.) Broń staje się bronią potężnych ciosów +3.

Spell Effect: Safeguard Secret.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Safeguard Secret
Spell Effect: Safeguard Secret.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.OsrtOeG0TvDNnEFH]{Safeguard Secret}.

The targets gain +4 status bonus to skill checks (typically Deception checks) to conceal this knowledge and to saving throws against spells that specifically attempt to obtain this knowledge from them and effects that would force them to reveal it.

Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Failure).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sage's Curse (Porażka)
Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.APDrC83QljsyHenB]{Sage's Curse}

The target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting an Arcana, Lore, Occultism, or Society check.

Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Success).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sage's Curse (Sukces)
Spell Effect: Sage's Curse (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.APDrC83QljsyHenB]{Sage's Curse}

The target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting an Arcana, Lore, Occultism, or Society check.

Spell Effect: Sand Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sand Form
Spell Effect: Sand Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KjC2ya8HD5AENeHI]{Sand Form}

You grant the target's body and gear aspects of sand. The target gains resistance to piercing and slashing damage, has no scent, and can't bleed. In sandy terrain, even when out in the open, the target has enough concealment to attempt to Hide. Each time the target takes damage to which sand form grants resistance, reduce the duration of the spell by 1 minute.

Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (Success).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Schadenfreude (Sukces)
Spell Effect: Schadenfreude (Success).description: Istota jest dekoncentrowana przez swoje zadowolenie i ponosi karę statusową –1 do testów Percepcji i rzutów obronnych Woli na 1 rundę.

Spell Effect: Seal Fate.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Seal Fate
Spell Effect: Seal Fate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gfKhtVsXF3HKSdmY]{Seal Fate}

The target gains weakness to the chosen damage type.

Spell Effect: See the Unseen.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: See the Unseen
Spell Effect: See the Unseen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See the Unseen}

You can see invisible creatures as though they weren't invisible, although their features are blurred, making them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and difficult to identify. You also gain a +2 status bonus to checks you make to disbelieve illusions.

Spell Effect: Serrate.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Serrate
Spell Effect: Serrate.description: Strikes with the target weapon deal additional slashing damage until the start of your next turn.

Spell Effect: Shield.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Tarcza
Spell Effect: Shield.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Tarczę}

Wznosisz magiczną tarczę z czystej energii. Liczy się to jako Wzniesienie Tarczy, zapewniając ci premię sytuacyjną +1 do KP do początku twojej następnej tury, ale nie wymaga użycia ręki. Kiedy trwa zaklęcie możesz użyć reakcji Bloku Tarczą ze swoją magiczną tarczą. Po użyciu Bloku Tarczą zaklęcie się kończy i nie możesz go rzucać ponownie przez 10 minut.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shifting Form
Spell Effect: Shifting Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form}

You gain one of the following abilities of your choice.

  • You gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed.
  • You gain a climb or swim Speed equal to half your Speed.
  • You gain darkvision.
  • You gain a pair of claws. These are agile finesse unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage.
  • You gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Claws).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shifting Form (Claws)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Claws).description: Granted by casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain a pair of claws.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Climb Speed.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shifting Form (Climb Speed)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Climb Speed.description: Granted by casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain a climb speed equal to half your Speed.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Darkvision).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shifting Form (Darkvision)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Darkvision).description: Granted by casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain darkvision.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Scent).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shifting Form (Scent)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Scent).description: Granted by casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain scent 60 feet (imprecise).

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Speed).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shifting Form (Speed)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Speed).description: Granted by casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain a 20-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Swim Speed).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shifting Form (Swim Speed)
Spell Effect: Shifting Form (Swim Speed).description: Granted by casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SDkIFrrO1PsE02Kd]{Shifting Form} and choosing to gain a swim speed equal to half your Speed.

Spell Effect: Shillelagh.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shillelagh
Spell Effect: Shillelagh.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{Shillelagh}

The target grows vines and leaves, brimming with primal energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon while in your hands, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two. Additionally, as long as you are on your home plane, attacks you make with the target against aberrations, extraplanar creatures, and undead increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.

Spell Effect: Shrink.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Shrink
Spell Effect: Shrink.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PjhUmyKnq6K5uDby]{Shrink}

The target shrinks to become Tiny in size. Its equipment shrinks with it but returns to its original size if removed. The creature's reach changes to 0 feet. This spell has no effect on a Tiny creature.

Spell Effect: Silence.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Silence
Spell Effect: Silence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence}

The target makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing it using hearing alone. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use actions with the auditory trait. This prevents it from casting spells due to the magical words involved in casting, with the exception of subtle spells.

Heightened (4th) The spell creates an aura in a 10-foot emanation around the touched creature, silencing all sound in or passing through it. While within the aura, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target.

Spell Effect: Song of Strength.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Song of Strength
Spell Effect: Song of Strength.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Xxdwkt0EEDgP1LGc]{Song of Strength}

You gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and DCs against Athletics skill actions such as Disarm, Reposition, Shove, and Trip.

Spell Effect: Soothe.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Soothe
Spell Effect: Soothe.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{Soothe}

Your mind is bolstered against hostile effects, granting a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Soothing Blossoms
Spell Effect: Soothing Blossoms.description: When any creature in the area rolls a successful save against a poison or disease effect, it gets a critical success instead. The blossoms grant assisted recovery to everyone in the area to end their persistent damage, both when the spell is cast and at the start of each of your turns. This spell doesn't give a benefit on a save against an affliction unless the stage lasts 10 minutes or less.

Spell Effect: Soothing Words.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Soothing Words
Spell Effect: Soothing Words.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YGRpHU5yxw73mls8]{Soothing Words}.

The target gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 against emotion effects

Heightened (5th) The bonus to saves increases to +2, or +3 against emotion effects.

Spell Effect: Speaking Sky.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Speaking Sky
Spell Effect: Speaking Sky.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Zvg0FWzClGbzucFd]{Speaking Sky}

The air speaks to you. You can precisely sense any motion within 60 feet through vibration and air movement.

Spell Effect: Spiral of Horrors.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Spiral of Horrors
Spell Effect: Spiral of Horrors.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KPGGkyBFbKse7KpK]{Spiral of Horrors}

Foes in the area are frightened 1 and unable to reduce the condition.

Spell Effect: Spirit Sense.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Spirit Sense
Spell Effect: Spirit Sense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3ehSrqTAm7IPqbIZ]{Spirit Sense}

You gain a +1 status bonus to the following checks regarding haunts or spirits: Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, skill checks to determine the reason for their existence, and skill checks to disable a haunt. You also gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws against haunts and spirits.

Spell Effect: Stormwind Flight.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Stormwind Flight
Spell Effect: Stormwind Flight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gSFg9zKwgcNZLMEs]{Stormwind Flight}.

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Stumbling Curse.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Stumbling Curse
Spell Effect: Stumbling Curse.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.X8PSYw6WC2ePYSXd]{Stumbling Curse}

The target takes a –2 status penalty to Athletics and Acrobatics checks.

Spell Effect: Summon Healing Servitor.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Summon Healing Servitor
Spell Effect: Summon Healing Servitor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3r897dYO8oYvuyn5]{Summon Healing Servitor}

All allies within 20 feet of the Servitor gain temporary Hit Points until the servitor departs.

Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Summoner's Visage
Spell Effect: Summoner's Visage.description: Your eidolon gains a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate you and can add its level to such checks even if it's untrained.

Spell Effect: Sun's Fury.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sun's Fury
Spell Effect: Sun's Fury.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LrFUj76CHDBV0vHW]{Sun's Fury}

The weapon deals an additional 1d4 fire and 1 spirit damage on a successful Strike. In addition, the flame causes the weapon to glow as bright as a torch.

Spell Effect: Sure Strike.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Pewny Cios
Spell Effect: Sure Strike.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Pewny Cios}

Zerknięcie w przyszłość zapewnia, że twoje następne uderzenie dosięgnie celu. Następnym razem kiedy wykonasz rzut na atak przed końcem swojej tury, rzuć na atak dwa razy i wybierz korzystniejszy wynik. Atak ignoruje kary sytuacyjne do trafienia oraz konieczność wykonywania testów płaskich wywoływanych przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Przysłonięcie} lub @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Schowanie} celu.

Spell Effect: Swampcall.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Swampcall
Spell Effect: Swampcall.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lbrWMnS2pecKaSVB]{Swampcall}

The creature takes a circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes off-guard.

Spell Effect: Swampcall (Critical Failur.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Swampcall (Krytyczna Porażka)
Spell Effect: Swampcall (Critical Failur.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lbrWMnS2pecKaSVB]{Swampcall}

You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

Krytyczna Porażka The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a –15-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.

Spell Effect: Swampcall (Failure).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Swampcall (Porażka)
Spell Effect: Swampcall (Failure).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lbrWMnS2pecKaSVB]{Swampcall}

You call upon the spirits of the soil to twist and churn, transforming the terrain in the targeted area into a sodden mess. The area becomes difficult terrain. Creatures in the area when you Cast this Spell must attempt a Reflex saving throw.

Porażka The creature sinks partially into the mud. The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds (except for its swim Speed, if any) and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}. These effects last until the creature leaves the area or until the end of its next turn, whichever comes first.

Spell Effect: Swarm Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Swarm Form
Spell Effect: Swarm Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pd2M1XY8EXrSfWgJ]{Swarm Form}

While in swarm form, you have the swarm trait and you gain resistance to slashing and piercing damage and weakness to area and splash damage.

Spell Effect: Sweet Dream.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sweet Dream
Spell Effect: Sweet Dream.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BRtKFk0PKfWIlCAB]{Sweet Dream}

  • Dream of Insight status bonus to Intelligence-based skill checks
  • Dream of Glamor status bonus to Charisma-based skill checks
  • Dream of Voyaging +5-foot status bonus to Speed

Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Glamour).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sweet Dream (Glamour)
Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Glamour).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BRtKFk0PKfWIlCAB]{Sweet Dream}.

You gain +1 status bonus to Charisma-based skill checks.

Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Insight).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sweet Dream (Insight)
Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Insight).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BRtKFk0PKfWIlCAB]{Sweet Dream}.

You gain +1 status bonus to Intelligence-based skill checks.

Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Voyaging).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sweet Dream (Voyaging)
Spell Effect: Sweet Dream (Voyaging).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.BRtKFk0PKfWIlCAB]{Sweet Dream}.

You gain +5 foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Sweetest Solstice.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Sweetest Solstice
Spell Effect: Sweetest Solstice.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against fear effects. On a critical success you also gain this bonus to emotion effects.

Spell Effect: Tailwind.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Wiatr w Plecy
Spell Effect: Tailwind.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Wiatr w Plecy}

Zyskujesz premię statusową +10 stóp do swoich prędkości.

Spell Effect: Tailwind (8 hours).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Wiatr w Plecy (8 godzin)
Spell Effect: Tailwind (8 hours).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Wiatr w Plecy}

Zyskujesz premię statusową +10 stóp do swoich prędkości.

Spell Effect: Take Root.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Zakorzenienie
Spell Effect: Take Root.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WUNZizIe6rnVHGcr]{Zakorzenienie}

Obrana za cel istota zyskuje premię sytuacyjną +1 do swojego ST Krzepy przeciw próbom odepchnięcia jej oraz premię sytuacyjną +1 do jej ST Refleksu przeciw próbom rozbrojenia i podcięcia jej.

Spell Effect: Take its Course (Afflictio.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Take its Course (Affliction, Help)
Spell Effect: Take its Course (Afflictio.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZeHeNQ5BNq6m5F1j]{Take its Course}, when used to help a target against an affliction.

The target gains a +2 status bonus to its saving throw against the affliction.

Spell Effect: Take its Course (Afflictio.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Take its Course (Affliction, Hinder)
Spell Effect: Take its Course (Afflictio.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZeHeNQ5BNq6m5F1j]{Take its Course}, when used to hinder a target against an affliction.

The target gains a –2 status bonus to its saving throw against the affliction.

Spell Effect: Tangle Vine.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Plączące Pnącze
Spell Effect: Tangle Vine.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Plączące Pnącze}

Ponosisz karę sytuacyjną –10 stóp do swoich Prędkości.

Spell Effect: Tempest Cloak.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempest Cloak
Spell Effect: Tempest Cloak.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.70BjbNRVc4OTLAgN]{Tempest Cloak}

The twisting shield of wind creates difficult terrain in a 5-foot burst surrounding the target. The target also gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its AC against physical ranged attacks, such as attacks made with bows, javelins, or slings. In addition, the sound of the swirling storms makes it easier for the target to ignore anything it doesn't want to hear, granting the target a +2 circumstance bonus to all defenses against auditory effects.

Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Air).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempest Form (Air)
Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Air).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.

When you cast this spell, choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist.

You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC and use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks and don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

Air

  • You gain a Fly Speed of 20 feet and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} while you are in the air.
  • You can create the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} from your space as a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait.

Heightened (+2) Increase the resistance by 5.

Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Mist).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempest Form (Mist)
Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Mist).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.

When you cast this spell, choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist.

You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC and use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks and don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

Mist

  • You gain a Fly Speed of 20 feet, and it becomes hard to see through you.
  • Any creature on one side of your space who is targeted by a creature on the opposite side is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to the targeting creature.

Heightened (+2) Increase the resistance by 5.

Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Water).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempest Form (Water)
Spell Effect: Tempest Form (Water).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zhqnMOVPzVvWSUbC]{Tempest Form}

Your body becomes fluid to better suit your surroundings.

When you cast this spell, choose whether to become air, water, or mist. The spell gains the air trait if you choose air or mist, and the water trait if you choose water or mist.

You become amorphous, as does your armor. You lose any item bonus to AC and use your proficiency bonus for unarmored defense to determine your AC. You also gain resistance 10 to physical damage and become immune to precision damage. You can slip through tiny cracks and don't need to breathe. You can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. You also gain the following effects based on your form.

Water

  • You gain a Swim Speed of 20 feet and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} while you are in the water.
  • You can electrically charge yourself by taking a single action, which has the manipulate trait. If you do, you are no longer Invisible in the water due to electricity indicating your location, but any creature that makes a melee attack against you takes @Damage[1d6[electricity]] damage; if it touches you, this is cumulative with the damage from your major curse.

Heightened (+2) Increase the resistance by 5 and the electricity damage from the charged water form by 1.

Spell Effect: Tempt Fate.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Tempt Fate
Spell Effect: Tempt Fate.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GqvKSxzN7A7kuFk4]{Tempt Fate}

The target gains a status bonus to the triggering saving throw. If the saving throw's result is a success, it becomes a critical success. If it's a failure, it becomes a critical failure, and the critical failure can't be reduced by abilities that usually reduce critical failure.

Spell Effect: Thermal Remedy.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Thermal Remedy
Spell Effect: Thermal Remedy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.l194BTf9cAFlSQ96]{Thermal Remedy}

Choose one of the benefits listed below. Any creature that consumes the targeted drink or food gains that benefit.

  • Gain temporary Hit Points.
  • Gain resistance to fire.
  • Gain a circumstance bonus to saves against disease.

Spell Effect: Thermal Stasis.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Thermal Stasis
Spell Effect: Thermal Stasis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dhpXpzt7TCm8TbHM]{Thermal Stasis}

The target gains resistance 2 against fire damage and resistance 2 against cold damage.

Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Gąszcz Ostrzy
Spell Effect: Thicket of Knives.description: Tworzysz liczne widmowe kopie swojej ręki dzierżącej broń, ukrywając swoje prawdziwe ruchy i czyniąc swoje ataki nieprzewidywalnymi. Zyskujesz premię statusową +2 do testów Oszukiwania. Jeśli jesteś niewyszkolony w Oszukiwaniu, możesz użyć akcji Finty mimo to i dodajesz swój poziom jako wartość swojej premii z biegłości.

Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Thundering Dominance
Spell Effect: Thundering Dominance.description:
You shroud the target in a powerful predatory aura and amplify its vocalizations. It gains a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks. Once during this spell's duration, it can take the Thundering Roar action.

Heightened (+2) The status bonus to Intimidation checks increases by 1 (to a maximum of a +4 status bonus for an 8th-rank spell), and the damage from the roar increases by 2d8.

Spell Effect: Tomorrow's Dawn.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Tomorrow's Dawn
Spell Effect: Tomorrow's Dawn.description: You cast bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) and gain mental resistance.

Spell Effect: Touch of Corruption.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Touch of Corruption
Spell Effect: Touch of Corruption.description: Granted by failing the save against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jFmWSIpJGGebim6y]{Touch of Corruption}.

Spell Effect: Touch of the Moon.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Touch of the Moon
Spell Effect: Touch of the Moon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.oXCwHBeDja4e0Mx0]{Touch of the Moon}

The target glows with dim light in a 20-foot radius. It also gets a benefit based on a phase of the moon, starting with the new moon and changing to the next phase at the end of each of its turns.

  • New Moon The target receives no benefit.
  • Waxing Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +4 status bonus to damage rolls.
  • Full Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, AC, and saves, and a +4 status bonus to damage.
  • Waning Moon The target gains a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws. After this phase, return to the new moon.

Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Encounter).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Transmigrate (Encounter)
Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Encounter).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8Lk9K3tRnV68MQPW]{Transmigrate}

You gain a +1 status bonus to all Strikes, saving throws, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Skill).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Transmigrate (Skill)
Spell Effect: Transmigrate (Skill).description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8Lk9K3tRnV68MQPW]{Transmigrate}

You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks.

Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Traveler's Transit
Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LrhTFHUtSS9ahogL]{Traveler's Transit}

You gain either a climb Speed or a swim Speed. The Speed is equal to your land Speed.

Heightened (5th) You can choose to gain a fly Speed.

Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Climb).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Traveler's Transit (Climb)
Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Climb).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LrhTFHUtSS9ahogL]{Traveler's Transit}.

You gain a climb speed equal to your land speed.

Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Fly).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Traveler's Transit (Fly)
Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Fly).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LrhTFHUtSS9ahogL]{Traveler's Transit}.

You gain a fly speed equal to your land speed.

Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Swim).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Traveler's Transit (Swim)
Spell Effect: Traveler's Transit (Swim).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LrhTFHUtSS9ahogL]{Traveler's Transit}.

You gain a swim speed equal to your land speed.

Spell Effect: Tremorsense.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Tremorsense
Spell Effect: Tremorsense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.EAYViUegegttJF1u]{Tremorsense}

You gain tremorsense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet.

Spell Effect: Triple Time.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Triple Time
Spell Effect: Triple Time.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.c8R2fpk88fBwJ1ie]{Triple Time}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Aura.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Unblinking Flame Aura
Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.floDCUOSzT0F6r77]{Unblinking Flame Aura}

You gain a +2 status bonus on Perception checks and resistance 10 to cold.

Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Ignition.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Unblinking Flame Ignition
Spell Effect: Unblinking Flame Ignition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aFd00WT266VYPqOG]{Unblinking Flame Ignition}

You gain greater darkvision, low‐light vision, and the ability to see invisible creatures. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed as you launch flame from your aura to soar through the sky. You become quickened, and you can use the extra action each round only to Strike or Fly using your flames.

Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Barrier.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Unbreaking Wave Barrier
Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Barrier.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YtJXpiu4ijkB6nP2]{Unbreaking Wave Barrier}

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC.

Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Vapor.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Unbreaking Wave Vapor
Spell Effect: Unbreaking Wave Vapor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZQk2cGBCkATO25w0]{Unbreaking Wave Vapor}

You're concealed against the triggering attack and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against it.

Spell Effect: Untamed Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Untamed Form
Spell Effect: Untamed Form.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8RWfKConLYFZpQ9X]{Untamed Form}

You reach within for a different part of yourself, and you set it free, transforming your body into another form. You can polymorph into any form listed in pest form, which lasts 10 minutes. All other untamed form shapes last 1 minute. You can add more shapes to your untamed form list with druid feats; your feat might grant you some or all of the shapes from a given polymorph spell.

When you transform into a shape granted by a spell, you gain all the effects of the shape you chose from a version of the spell heightened to untamed form's rank. Untamed form allows you to use your own shapeshifting training more easily than most polymorph spells. When you choose to use your own attack modifier while polymorphed instead of the form's default attack modifier, you gain a +2 status bonus to your attack rolls.

Heightened (2nd) You can transform into shapes listed in animal form.

Spell Effect: Untamed Shift.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Untamed Shift
Spell Effect: Untamed Shift.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0xR9vrt6uDFl0Umo]{Untamed Shift}

You transform just a part of your body.

Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Augmentati.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Untwisting Iron Augmentation
Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Augmentati.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8eOMAIvT7S1CJSit]{Untwisting Iron Augmentation}

Your unarmed attacks are treated as cold iron and silver, they gain the earth trait, and they gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls per damage die.

Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Pillar.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Untwisting Iron Pillar
Spell Effect: Untwisting Iron Pillar.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9DtuMEyHhtHFRp5a]{Untwisting Iron Pillar}

You gain 50 temporary Hit Points that last for the duration or until you lose them, as well as resistance 5 to all physical damage (except adamantine).

Spell Effect: Vapor Form.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Vapor Form
Spell Effect: Vapor Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Vapor Form}

The target gains resistance 8 to physical damage and is immune to precision damage. The target also gains a fly Speed of 10 feet.

Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gra.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Variable Gravity (High Gravity)
Spell Effect: Variable Gravity (High Gra.description: You gain a +2 status bonus to your saving throws and DCs to resist forced movement and attempts to knock you prone

Spell Effect: Veil of Dreams.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Veil of Dreams
Spell Effect: Veil of Dreams.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NNoKWiWKqJkdD2ln]{Veil of Dreams}

The target takes a –1 status penalty to Perception, attack rolls, and Will saves. This penalty increases to –2 for Will saves against sleep effects.

Spell Effect: Vision of Weakness.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Vision of Weakness
Spell Effect: Vision of Weakness.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.NhNKzq1DvFxkvTEc]{Vision of Weakness}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your next attack roll (or skill check made as part of an attack action) against that foe before the end of your turn.

Spell Effect: Vital Beacon.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Vital Beacon
Spell Effect: Vital Beacon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ikSb3LRGnrwXJBVX]{Vital Beacon}
Vitality radiates outward from you, allowing others to supplicate and receive healing. Once per round, either you or an ally can use an Interact action to supplicate and lay hands upon you to regain Hit Points. Each time the beacon heals someone, it decreases in strength. It restores 4d10 Hit Points to the first creature, 4d8 Hit Points to the second, 4d6 Hit Points to the third, and 4d4 Hit Points to the fourth, after which the spell ends. You can have only one vital beacon active at a time.
[[/r (@item.level)d10[healing]]]{First Activation (d10)}
[[/r (@item.level)d8[healing]]]{Second Activation (d8)}
[[/r (@item.level)d6[healing]]]{Third Activation (d6)}
[[/r (@item.level)d4[healing]]]{Fourth Activation (d4)}

Spell Effect: Vital Luminance.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Vital Luminance
Spell Effect: Vital Luminance.description:
You glow with bright light in a 30-foot emanation (and dim light to the next 30 feet).

If an undead creature damages you with an attack or spell while it's within the area of your light, that creature takes vitality damage equal to half your luminance reservoir value. It takes this damage only the first time it damages you in a round. (@Damage[(0.5 * @item.badge.value * @item.level)[vitality]])

You can Dismiss this Spell. When you do, you can target a creature within your light and direct the vitality energy into it. The target must be a willing living creature or an undead creature. This heals a living target or damages an undead target by an amount equal to your luminance reservoir's value. ([[/r (@item.badge.value * @item.level)[healing]]]{Healing})

Note: The reservoir value is the effect level times the badge value of this effect. The effect level will be set automatically when casting the spell.

Spell Effect: Vitrifying Blast.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Vitrifying Blast
Spell Effect: Vitrifying Blast.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g2V4ID0pl1ZGAxZj]{Vitrifying Blast}

The target gains weakness to sonic and bludgeoning damage.

Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+1).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Warding Aggression (+1)
Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+1).description:
Warding aggression ends if the foe you attacked dies or at the end of any turn in which you didn't hit that foe with a melee Strike.

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC against the foe for the remaining duration.

Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+2).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Warding Aggression (+2)
Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+2).description:
Warding aggression ends if the foe you attacked dies or at the end of any turn in which you didn't hit that foe with a melee Strike.

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC against the foe for the remaining duration.

Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+3).name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Warding Aggression (+3)
Spell Effect: Warding Aggression (+3).description: You gain a +3 status bonus to AC against the foe for 1 round

Spell Effect: Wash Your Luck.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Wash Your Luck
Spell Effect: Wash Your Luck.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.lmHmKGs1N3yNAvln]{Wash Your Luck}.

Once during the spell's duration, before rolling a check, you can cancel out a misfortune effect on that roll, as normal when a fortune and misfortune effect apply to the same roll. After canceling out the misfortune effect, the spell ends, and you are then temporarily immune to wash your luck for 10 minutes.

Spell Effect: Weaken Earth.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Osłabienie Ziemi
Spell Effect: Weaken Earth.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.eyKkLp8V55ydA64J]{Osłabienie Ziemi}

Cel zyskuje podatność na obrażenia fizyczne.

Spell Effect: Weapon Surge.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Weapon Surge
Spell Effect: Weapon Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.W37iBXLsY2trJ1rS]{Weapon Surge}

On your next Strike with the weapon before the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll, the weapon deals additional spirit damage, and the Strike gains the sanctified trait.

Spell Effect: Weapon Surge (Major Striki.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Weapon Surge (Major Striking)
Spell Effect: Weapon Surge (Major Striki.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.W37iBXLsY2trJ1rS]{Weapon Surge} when applied to a weapon with a major striking rune.

On your next Strike with that weapon before the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll.

Spell Effect: Wind Jump.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Wind Jump
Spell Effect: Wind Jump.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kRxlkPPe6Gr7Du59]{Wind Jump}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall.

Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Failure.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Wish-Twisted Form (Porażka)
Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Failure.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.B3tbO85GBpzQ3u8l]{Wish-Twisted Form}.

Implemented Effects:

  • The target gains weakness 5 to the chosen damage type.
  • The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds.
  • The target takes a –1 status penalty to its saving throws.

Unimplemented Effects:

  • The target's resistances are reduced by 5.

Heightened (+1) Increase the weakness and the reduction to resistances by 1.

Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Success.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Wish-Twisted Form (Sukces)
Spell Effect: Wish-Twisted Form (Success.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.B3tbO85GBpzQ3u8l]{Wish-Twisted Form}.

Implemented Effects:

  • The target gains weakness 5 to the chosen damage type.
  • The target takes a –10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds.
  • The target takes a –1 status penalty to its saving throws.

Unimplemented Effects:

  • The target's resistances are reduced by 5.

Heightened (+1) Increase the weakness and the reduction to resistances by 1.

Spell Effect: Wooden Fists.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Drewniane Pięści
Spell Effect: Wooden Fists.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IHjiWCouSacC5b3g]{Drewniane Pięści}

Twoje pięści zadają dodatkowe obrażenia obuchowe, tracą cechę niezabójczości i zyskują wysięg.

Spell Effect: Word of Truth.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Word of Truth
Spell Effect: Word of Truth.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aF7RiG7c8GzSQLYt]{Word of Truth}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Diplomacy checks.

Spell Effect: Zealous Conviction.name: Efekt Zaklęcia: Zealous Conviction
Spell Effect: Zealous Conviction.description:
Zapewniany przez @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.GYD0XZ4t3tQq6shc]{Zealous Conviction}

The targets each gain temporary Hit Points and a status bonus to Will saves against mental effects.
